projects.title: rojects
projects.taittinger: Front and back-end development of the tasting and tour reservation website for Taittinger, a French Champagne house.
projects.eatic: Front and back-end development of a web and mobile app focused on vegetarian meal delivery.
projects.alchimie: Development of a WordPress theme for Baccarat Alchemy, an immersive experience at Chapelle Saint-Anne.
projects.viking: Development of a WordPress theme for Cité Immersive Viking, an immersive museum in Rouen.
projects.photocinelive: Development of a WordPress theme for PhotoCineLive, live production solutions.
